description: Handles all residential and commercial water service inquiries including outages, water quality, leak reports, billing disputes, payment tracking, and service start/stop. Uses structured decision logic to diagnose, resolve, de-escalate, and route issues. Maintains empathetic, professional tone adapted to customer mood.

example_response.response: The agent's conversational response to the customer
example_response.intent_category: Classified intent: outage, water_quality, leak, billing, payment, service, general
